|brand = Hardkernel |model = ODROID-X |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = 2 (2GB) |revision = Rev 0.4 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Samsung;Exynos 4412 (Prime); |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARMv7 |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 1.7 GHz <!-- 1.4GHz / 1.6GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;PoP; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = SMSC;LAN9514; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2010.12 |stockos = Linux;3.6.0-rc1;;,
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (OTG), SDHC Card slot, eMMC module connector, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 7 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 0.8 |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, 1.8V TTL, (115200 8N1), |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Audio in (3.5mm), Audio out (3.5 mm), Micro HDMI output, power switch, |addchip = Power management IC;Maxim;MAX77686;;1;,,, Low Power Stereo Audio Codec;Maxim;MAX98090;;1;,,, Integrated USB 2.0-compatible 3-port Hub;SMSC;USB3503A;;1;,,, 1A PWM/VFM Step-down DC/DC Converter;Ricoh;RP505K331B;;1;,,, 2-Bit Voltage Translator/Buffer/Repeater Isolator for I2C;Fairchild;FXMA2102L8X;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 08/2012 <!-- (20120808) --> |estprice = 149 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Korea
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :RAM is LPDDR2 PoP with processor (@880MHz)
eMMC module connector with modules of 8GB, 16GB, 32GB and 64GB available.
{{See also|ODROID#Models|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Samsung]]'' Exynos 4412 (Prime) @1.7GHz :SoC: Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A9) :GPU: Mali-400 MP4 @533MHz *Storage: SDHC Card slot, :eMMC module connector *RAM: 2GB (LPDDR2) @880MHz
==Links of Interest== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ODROID ''ODROID'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://wiki.odroid.com/old_product/odroid-x_u_q/odroid-xq ''ODROID-X, X2, Q Hardware manual'' on '''ODROID Wiki'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2012/11/01/149-hardkernel-odroid-x2-with-exynos-4412-1-7-ghz-and-2-gb-ram/ ''Hardkernel ODroid-X2 Development Board'' on '''CNX|Software''']
==See also== <!--*[[ODROID-C0]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM Cortex-A5 CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C1]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM Cortex-A5 CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C1+]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM Cortex-A5 CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C2]] - ''Amlogic'' S905 4-cores ARM Cortex-A53 CPU @2.0GHz *[[ODROID-GO]] - ''Espressif Systems'' ESP32 Dual Core LX6 @240MHz *[[ODROID-H2]] - ''Intel'' J4105 4-cores Celeron @2.5GHz *[[ODROID-HC1]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-HC2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-N2]] - ''Amlogic'' S922X 4-cores ARM Cortex-A73 @1.8GHz ::::::and 2-cores ARM Cortex-A53 @1.9GHz CPU *[[ODROID-U2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-U3]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz --> *[[ODROID-X]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A9) @1.4GHz *[[ODROID-X2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A9) @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-XU]] - "Samsung" Exynos 5410 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A15) @1.6GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A7) @1.2GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU3]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A15) @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A7) @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU3 Lite]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A15) @1.8GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A7) @1.3GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU4]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A15) @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A7) @1.4GHz CPU
